author: hiranya
msg: Extended the url text retriever to process fragments of URLs (if needed). Therefore now the match evaluator and the equal evaluator can be used to evaluate full URLs or fragments of URLs. Recognized URL fragments are:
The fragment to be matched (evaluated) can be stated using the optional 'fragment' attribute in the <equal> element or the <match> element.
